title: I OPEN & YOU WIN!!! #8 | Hextech Opening + Giveaway! | $0,00 Opening

body:
I have like 100 Chests and a lot of Capsules from the last year and i will open them all in different videos. In each video i will open ten chests and If you guess a champion in the comments that is in one of the ten chests, that i open, then you will win 1580 RP, straight. So go down in the comment section and write down a champion name, where you think this guy will be definitely in one of the chests in the next video. 

Rules: 
-Leave a comment with just one Champion name!
-get picked by the random generator in order to win!
-you have about 5 Days to join my Discord and msg me!
-after a short Check, you will get paid!
